Message:
The witches who were
saved by the Duke of Fran
also live in his mansion.

There is Illya,
a girl as bright as the sun,
who treats everyone
with kindness.

Then there is Iris,
the caring attendant to the Duke,
who is just as strict with others
as she is with herself.

Rosalie, who is known
as the Great Sorceress,
may look young,
but has lived for
hundreds of years.

Natasha tends to
keep to herself,
but she loves flowers
more than anyone.

By simply hearing about
everyone’s personalities,
it is difficult to see them
as terrifying creatures, is it not?

Girls called the Witches of Qlipha
are sent out of control by
some outside force,

spreading their Curses
against their own will.

Seeing a witch in that state
gave me a sense of déjà vu.
I wonder if you would feel
the same way too, my lord.

Someone is making
the witches go out of control.
Does it not remind you of
Noah and the Mystical Beasts
in our world?
